<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Inscription Info By Address</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/btc/{network}/inscriptions/addresses/{address}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Get Ordinals inscription info by owner address.
